options.content: INTEND 5G4Data Intent Dashboard

targets.queryText:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX quan: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/QuantityOntology/>
PREFIX icm: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/IntentCommonModel/>
PREFIX set: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/SetOperators/>
PREFIX log: <http://tio.models.tmforum.org/tio/v3.6.0/LogicalOperators/>
PREFIX data5g: <http://5g4data.eu/5g4data#>

SELECT (COALESCE(?value1Computed, ?secondValue, ?singleValue) AS ?value1)
       (COALESCE(?value2Computed, ?thirdValue, ?singleValue) AS ?value2)
WHERE {
  SERVICE <repository:intents> {
    BIND(data5g:${intent_id} AS ?intent) .
    BIND(data5g:${metric_name} AS ?metric) .

    ?intent_id log:allOf ?expectation .
    ?expectation log:allOf ?condition .
    ?condition set:forAll ?forallBlock .
    ?forallBlock icm:valuesOfTargetProperty ?metric .

    OPTIONAL {
      ?forallBlock quan:inRange ?list .
      ?list rdf:rest ?list1 .
      ?list1 rdf:first ?node2 .
      ?node2 rdf:value ?secondValue .

      OPTIONAL {
        ?list1 rdf:rest ?list2 .
        ?list2 rdf:first ?node3 .
        ?node3 rdf:value ?thirdValue .
      }
    }

    OPTIONAL {
      ?forallBlock quan:atLeast ?singleNodeAtLeast .
      ?singleNodeAtLeast rdf:value ?largerValue .
      BIND(10000 AS ?value2Computed)
      BIND(?largerValue AS ?value1Computed)
    }

    OPTIONAL {
      ?forallBlock quan:atMost ?singleNodeAtMost .
      ?singleNodeAtMost rdf:value ?smallerValue .
      BIND(0 AS ?value1Computed)
      BIND(?smallerValue AS ?value2Computed)
    }

    OPTIONAL {
      ?forallBlock quan:smaller ?singleNodeSmaller .
      ?singleNodeSmaller rdf:value ?smallerValue .
      BIND(0 AS ?value1Computed)
      BIND(?smallerValue AS ?value2Computed)
    }
        
    OPTIONAL {
      ?forallBlock quan:larger ?singleNodeLarger .
      ?singleNodeLarger rdf:value ?largerValue .
      BIND(10000 AS ?value2Computed)
      BIND(?largerValue AS ?value1Computed)
    }
    
    # Fallback singleValue for COALESCE
    BIND(COALESCE(?atLeastValue, ?atMostValue, ?smallerValue) AS ?singleValue)
  }
}
ORDER BY DESC(?value1)

panels.description: Prometheus data for metrics stored in Prometheus
panels.title: ${metric_name} (Prometheus)

title: Intent and Condition Metrics Timeseries Dashboard
